content.name: com.microchip.mcu32.mplabx.project.usb_apps_host_msd_basic_pic32ck_gc01_curiosity_ultra
content.displayName: MSD Basic Example (msd_basic) Example for PIC32CK GC Family
content.shortDescription: This application demonstrates the use of the MSD Host Class Driver to write a file to a USB Flash drive. The application uses the USB Host_layer , MSD class driver and the MPLAB Harmony File System Framework to enumerate a USB Flash drive and to write a file to it.
content.author: Microchip
